name: Lost Ethereal
description:
I am considering a full-length game (3-5 hours) based on the reception of the Low Rez Jam demo. Please take 2 minutes to give feedback to help make the next iteration better ☺


Humbly accepting the #lowrezjam 2016 award results!

2nd Place - Overall
2nd Place - Aesthetic
4th Place - Enjoyment
5th Place - Game Feel

Made with ♥

← ↑ → ↓ to enjoy.
1 to toggle fullscreen/windowed

Thanks for all your support, players and voters.

#lowrezjam2016
@LucreGames

* 5/19 - fixed the second play through bugs and cave water glitch for the web build
